title: Patient Safety Enhancement Curriculum Based on Healthcare Information Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical information system operation experience and managerial competency
context.additional_context: Optimization for Smartphone-Based Learning Environments, Emphasizing Practical Application Cases

learning_goals: Participants can explain patient data analysis processes using an EHR system with 90% accuracy
Learners can diagnose and improve ergonomic issues arising from healthcare information system implementations with over 85% performance proficiency
Trainees can develop and implement a healthcare information system training manual within their institution within four weeks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
